Tropic CLEAR SKIES cleansing powder

Brand: Tropic

Category: Facial Cleanser

Ingredients: distarch phosphate, sodium cocoyl glutamate, hydroxypropyl starch phosphate, citric acid, sodium gluconate, xanthan gum, lipase, protease, spirulina platensis extract, sodium hyaluronate, charcoal, maltodextrin
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; MODERATE: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
